p: Guangzhou Women and Children's Medical Center is the largest children's hospital in southern China and shoulders the responsibility of admission and management for 2019-nCoV-infected children in Guangzhou Province, mainly in Guangzhou City. The present study systematically reports data on 2019-nCoV-infected children in Guangzhou Women and Children's Medical Center. The clinical characteristics including general patient information, clinical symptoms, epidemiological history, and 2019-nCoV nucleic acid tests of secretions, and the radiological appearances were examined in detail, with emphasis on identifying and characterising the most common features of child clusters.
